title: Business Analyst
description:
Detail JD:

As an API integration business analyst, you are responsible to connect the business needs with technical implementation for Application Programming Interfaces (APIs). You are responsible for ensuring that APIs are integrated seamlessly into Banking Loan Origination System

Responsibilities

Understand business needs: Identify the business need for the API and how it will be used

Understand data exchange: Determine if data will be exchanged in one or both directions between systems

Understand error handling: Understand how errors will be handled and how to notify the relevant parties

Create API specifications: Draft high-level API requirements and create specifications

Get API specifications approved: Get API specifications ratified by stakeholders

Create API schema and sample messages: Create a schema and sample messages for the APIs

Ensure security: Follow best practices to ensure security

Collaborate with cross-functional teams: Work with teams from different disciplines to ensure the API meets the needs of the business

Skills Critical thinking, Problem-solving, Decision-making, Industry or business knowledge, and Management skills

Minimum work experience: 8+Years

Actual Skill Set:

Business Analyst with Java API Integration

Along with Skills Critical thinking, Problem-solving, Decision-making, Industry or business knowledge, and Management skills




Location: Bengaluru, Chennai and Hyderabad.
